description: Application for Non-Material amendment to planning permission ref: PA/22/00951, Dated 23/03/2023. Non Material amendment(s) Sought: Amendment to the Description of Development to read as follows:Demolition of the existing vacant Hatton House (Student Accommodation), the construction of a new building (G+5 storeys from Westfield Way and G+6 storeys from the canal-side) for teaching and educational purposes (Use Class F1), refurbishment and rear alterations of No. 357 Mile End Road (Use Class F2 and or F1), change of use of Lock Keeper's Cottage (from Use Class F1 to Use Class E and or F2) and demolition of the existing security office along with access, public realm works, landscaping and cycle parking and associated works.
site_name: Hatton House, Westfield Way, London, E1 4PD
